text:
Hi Dave! I'm not based in London, but it'd be a pleasure to have lunch with you at some point! If you give me a time and place I'll be there!

Would be nice to meet another creative!

I can't do weekends however as I have a part time job, but any day from Monday to Friday would be amazing!

And I can't believe you got to work on Game of Thrones! And its nice to hear that you enjoyed the work and people there! :slightly_smiling_face:
